statements: SELECT * FROM call_detail_records ORDER BY call_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT caller_number, callee_number, call_duration FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_quality_rating > 3
SELECT * FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_duration > 300 ORDER BY call_duration DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT caller_number, callee_number, call_date FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT DISTINCT caller_number, callee_number FROM call_detail_records
SELECT * FROM call_detail_records WHERE caller_number = '1234567890' ORDER BY call_date DESC, call_duration ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT caller_number, callee_number, call_duration FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_duration > 60 ORDER BY call_date ASC
SELECT caller_number, MAX(call_duration) AS max_duration FROM call_detail_records GROUP BY caller_number
SELECT DISTINCT caller_number FROM call_detail_records ORDER BY caller_number ASC
SELECT AVG(call_duration) AS avg_duration, SUM(call_duration) AS total_duration FROM call_detail_records
SELECT * FROM call_detail_records;
SELECT caller_number, receiver_number, call_duration FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_quality > 3;
SELECT network_id, network_name FROM network_performance ORDER BY network_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_performance WHERE latency < 10 AND bandwidth > 100;
SELECT caller_number, receiver_number, call_duration FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_duration > 300 ORDER BY call_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_duration > 300 ORDER BY call_duration DESC;
SELECT caller_number, receiver_number, call_duration FROM call_detail_records WHERE caller_number LIKE '1%' AND receiver_number LIKE '9%';
SELECT network_name, latency, bandwidth FROM network_performance WHERE latency < 50 AND bandwidth > 100 ORDER BY bandwidth DESC;
SELECT * FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_quality BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT network_name, latency, jitter FROM network_performance WHERE jitter > 20 ORDER BY latency ASC;
SELECT * FROM CallDetailRecords;
SELECT caller_number, receiver_number, call_duration FROM CallDetailRecords WHERE call_quality_rating > 4.5;
SELECT network_name, network_type FROM NetworkPerformance WHERE network_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY network_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT analysis_date FROM CallQualityAnalysis WHERE analysis_result = 'good' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT call_id, call_duration, call_quality_rating FROM CallDetailRecords JOIN CallQualityAnalysis ON CallDetailRecords.call_id = CallQualityAnalysis.call_id ORDER BY call_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM CallDetailRecords WHERE caller_number = 1234567890;
SELECT call_id, call_duration, call_quality_rating FROM CallDetailRecords WHERE call_duration > 60;
SELECT CDR.call_id, CDR.call_duration, NPA.network_name, NPA.network_type FROM CallDetailRecords AS CDR INNER JOIN NetworkPerformance AS NPA ON CDR.call_id = NPA.network_id;
SELECT MAX(call_duration) AS longest_call_duration FROM CallDetailRecords;
SELECT AVG(call_quality_rating) AS average_call_quality_rating FROM CallDetailRecords;
SELECT * FROM call_records;
SELECT caller_number, receiver_number, call_duration FROM call_records WHERE call_quality_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM network_performance ORDER BY latency_ms DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE device_location = 'Headquarters';
SELECT caller_location, receiver_location FROM call_locations WHERE call_duration > 300;
SELECT * FROM call_records ORDER BY call_duration DESC, call_quality_rating ASC;
SELECT id, caller_number, receiver_number FROM call_records WHERE call_duration > 300;

SELECT cr.caller_number, np.latency_ms, cl.call_duration FROM call_records cr JOIN network_performance np ON cr.id = np.call_id JOIN call_locations cl ON cr.id = cl.call_id WHERE np.packet_loss_rate < 0.05;

SELECT nd.device_name, nd.device_location, cr.call_duration FROM network_devices nd JOIN call_records cr ON nd.device_location = cl.caller_location JOIN call_locations cl ON cr.id = cl.call_id WHERE nd.device_type = 'router';

SELECT cr.call_duration, cl.caller_location, np.jitter_ms FROM call_records cr JOIN call_locations cl ON cr.id = cl.call_id JOIN network_performance np ON cr.id = np.call_id WHERE cl.receiver_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM call_records;
SELECT call_id, caller_number, call_duration FROM call_records WHERE call_duration > 60;
SELECT call_id, receiver_number FROM call_records WHERE call_datetime > '2021-10-01';
SELECT * FROM network_performance ORDER BY signal_strength DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM user_devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT * FROM call_records WHERE call_duration > 10;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT call_records.call_id, user_name, device_name FROM call_records JOIN user_devices ON call_records.call_id = user_devices.device_id;
SELECT user_name, call_duration FROM users JOIN call_records ON users.user_id = call_records.call_id WHERE users.user_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type, user_name FROM user_devices JOIN users ON user_devices.user_id = users.user_id;
